Betts singled to right, E. Hernández scored, Ohtani to second

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Dodgers shelled out $1 billion for Japanese talent in the offseason and it's paying off in the playoffs.
Ryan Brasier, A. Banda, M. Kopech, A. Vesia, E. Phillips, D. Hudson, B. Treinen, and L. Knack all pitched effectively for the Dodgers.
D. Cease pitched 1.2 innings, giving up 4 hits, 3 ER, 1 K, and 1 BB for the Padres.
The game was played at Petco Park with an attendance of 47,773.
